## Correlations & Bi-variate Analysis

File that helps identify which features have a positive correlation:

```{r}
## Creates a correlation plot
options(repr.plot.width=10, repr.plot.height=7) 

nums <- select_if(df, is.numeric)

corr <- round(cor(nums), 1)

ggcorrplot(corr, 
           type = "lower", 
           lab = TRUE, 
           lab_size = 3, 
           method="square", 
           colors = c("tomato2", "white", "#01A9DB"), 
           title="Correlogram Employee Attritions", 
           ggtheme=theme_minimal())
```
